pkg.name: 123done
pkg.description: A simple tasklist app that demonstrates FxA Sign-In

pkg.author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)
pkg.name: browserid-verifier
pkg.description: A node.js verification server for BrowserID assertions.

pkg.name: fortress
pkg.description: A simple tasklist app that demonstrates FxA Sign-In

scripts.build:client: tsc --build ../fxa-react && tsc --build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build-postcss && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PUBLIC_URL=/ INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false CI=false rescripts build
scripts.restart: tsc --build ../fxa-react && npm run build-postcss && pm2 restart pm2.config.js
scripts.start: tsc --build ../fxa-react && npm run build-postcss && pm2 start pm2.config.js
scripts.test:frontend: SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PUBLIC_URL=/ INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false CI=true rescripts test --coverage --verbose

scripts.test: npm run test-mysql && npm run test-server && npm run lint

pkg.name: fxa-auth-server
pkg.description: Firefox Accounts, an identity provider for Mozilla cloud services

scripts.build: tsc --build && cp -R config fxa-content-server-l10n lib scripts dist/fxa-auth-server
scripts.test-remote: MAILER_HOST=restmail.net MAILER_PORT=80 CORS_ORIGIN=http://baz mocha -r ts-node/register --timeout=300000 test/remote

pkg.author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)

scripts.start: node scripts/check-local-config && grunt l10n-create-json l10n-generate-tos-pp:app && pm2 start pm2.config.js

pkg.name: fxa-email-event-proxy
pkg.description: Proxies events from Sendgrid to FxA SQS queues

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha --ui tdd --recursive tests/

pkg.name: fxa-geodb
pkg.description: Firefox Accounts GeoDB Repo for Geolocation based services
pkg.author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)

pkg.name: fxa-metrics-processor
pkg.description: Firefox Accounts metrics ETL worker code
pkg.author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)

scripts.build: tsc --build ../fxa-react && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PUBLIC_URL=/ INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false CI=false rescripts build
scripts.test:frontend: SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PUBLIC_URL=/ INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false CI=yes rescripts test --coverage --verbose

pkg.name: fxa-react
pkg.description: Shared components for FxA React Apps
pkg.author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)

scripts.build-storybook: NODE_ENV=production STORYBOOK_BUILD=1 npm run build-postcss && build-storybook -s .storybook/design-guide
scripts.build: tsc --build ../fxa-react && NODE_ENV=production npm run build-postcss && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false rescripts build
scripts.restart: npm run build-postcss && pm2 restart pm2.config.js
scripts.start: npm run build-postcss && pm2 start pm2.config.js

pkg.name: fxa-support-panel
pkg.description: Small app to help customer support access FxA details
pkg.author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)
